description: Temporary Help Services Requirement for Department of National Defence (DND)\u00d Digital Transformation Office (DTO) open only to Indigenous businesses. The proposed period of contract shall be from 02 October to 48 weeks later. Estimated Level of Effort is 48 weeks, 7.5h/day, 37.5h/week.
full_summary:
### One (1) THS Stream 10.1 Communication Services, Junior (Limited to Indigenous Businesses)

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: CB-9047-9650367
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: W6952-24-082
* **Publication Date**: September 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 18, 2023, 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date**: September 18, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 2, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 13, 2024

#### Contract Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) / Digital Transformation Office (DTO) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services (THS) and has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) to suppliers who are qualified under the streams and categories outlined above.

This RFP is limited to Indigenous businesses that hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under EN578-172870 and are qualified under Stream 10.1, Communications Services, Junior.

The proposed contract will be for a period of 48 weeks, with an estimated level of effort of 7.5 hours per day, 37.5 hours per week.

#### Location of Work

The location of work will be at the National Capital Region (NCR), with specific locations at National Defence Headquarters, 285 Coventry Dr. Ottawa, Ontario, and 3500 Carling Ave.

#### Contracting Entity

* **Name**: PehSan Chuah
* **Address**: 285 Coventry Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1K 4M7, Canada
* **Phone**: (613) 406-1254
* **Email**: pehsan.chuah@forces.gc.ca

#### Enquiries

Enquiries regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to the DND Point of Contact (DND POC) listed above.

#### Goods and Services Codes

The following Goods and Services Codes (GSCs) apply to this RFP:

* UNSPSC Code: 80111600
* UNSPSC Description: Temporary personnel services

#### Trade Agreements

This RFP is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA). 

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

The Regions of Opportunity and Delivery for this RFP
